text:
Essentialists take the time to look at many possibilities before making a decision. They focus on committing fully to one or two ideas or activities, so they start by exploring a wide range of options to ensure they choose wisely.

By evaluating various choices thoroughly, Essentialists increase their chances of selecting the best path forward. This initial exploration is crucial because it allows them to gather insights and weigh their options carefully. Once they identify the most promising ideas, they can dedicate their energy and resources to those, maximizing their impact. This method of thoughtful deliberation helps them avoid the pitfalls of hasty decisions and leads to more meaningful outcomes in their pursuits.

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Essentialists thoroughly assess numerous options before dedicating themselves to a few key ideas or activities.
